name: Catsro-NOT
description:
Made for GBJAM9

Using:

  • GB Studio 2.0.0 Beta
  • Piskell (for art)

Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys | GB equivalent = dpad 

(Down Key/S to sit. It isn't very responsive but is possible)

Jump - k,x                                      | GB equivalent = B

Attack - z,j,c                                   | GB 

Summary:

Play as cat who crashed landed on an unfamiliar planet filled with grubs. Explore and pave your way through this gameboy-themed metroidvania.
